lead_paragraph: A driver looking to end a car lease early might turn to a broker, but using such a service comes with its own costs and restrictions.

headline.main: How a Car Lease-Transfer Broker Works — or May Not

snippet: A driver looking to end a car lease early might turn to a broker, but using such a service comes with its own costs and restrictions....
abstract: Lease-transfer companies like Swapalease.com and Leasetrader.com offer hope for some automobile lease holders who want to get out of their contracts early; not all automobile companies allow such transfers, however, and original lessee may remain liable for new lessee’s payments if that person defaults, damages car or exceeds allotted mileage.
